text.name: info3
text.text: The IBM Personal Computer, or IBM PC, is the original version and

text.name: info4
text.text: progenitor of the PC compatible hardware platform.

text.name: info5
text.text: The initial release was on August 12, 1981 with the IBM model 5150.

text.name: info6
text.text: It was created by a team of engineers and designers under the direction

text.name: info7
text.text: of Don Estridge of the IBM Entry Systems Division in Boca Raton, Florida.
